      • sequence

        public static byte[] sequence(int size,
                              int start)
        Creates a periodical list of numbers from 1 to 9, starting with start and looping if size is greater than 9.
        Parameters:
        size - Length of the resulting array
        start - Number between 1 and 9 inclusive; sequence starts with this number
        Returns:
        Array of numbers
